isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - INSTALL

note.para: Before starting reassembly, make sure the three magnetic discs are solidly in place at the bottom of the case. These can be secured to the disc mounting surfaces with Scotch Grip Rubber Adhesive or equivalent adhesive.

svcproc.title: COUNTERSHAFT ASSEMBLIES
svcproc.para: Place the left countershaft assembly into position in the case, making sure that the "L"-marked assembly has the larger 47-tooth PTO gear ( Figure 240). Place the right countershaft assembly into position in the case, making sure that the "R"-marked assembly has the smaller 45-tooth PTO gear.

figure.caption: Figure 240. Place Left Countershaft Assembly into Position
